name: SaveCache
description: Saves a cache with Universal Artifacts given a specified key.
author: Microsoft Corp

inputs.name: keyfile
inputs.label: Key file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filename or wildcard used as the key to lookup the cache folder. For example, for npm based projects this would be '**/package-lock.json'.

inputs.name: targetfolder
inputs.label: Target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder/file or wildcard of items to cache. For example, node projects can cache packages with '**/node_modules, !**/node_modules/**/node_modules'.

inputs.name: platformIndependent
inputs.label: Platform Independent?
inputs.description: Whether the cached artifact is platform independent (default is false).

inputs.name: alias
inputs.label: Cache alias
inputs.description: An optional alias to the cache to control the name of the output variable (E.g. An alias of 'Build' sets the output variable 'CacheRestored-Build').

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Verbosity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the amount of detail displayed in the output.
